title: Proposed Cover for "The New Yorker Magazine" or "Promenade Magazine"
medium: Graphite, pen and ink, brush and watercolor, crayon on off-white laid paper
description: Drawing of large, colorful birds perched in tree branches peering down at a group of the Audubon Society bird-watchers represented in small scale black and white.  They point, take notes, and look through field glasses.  Birds depicted based on Audubon prints.
name: Drawing
